interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FAMILIFE Soap Sheets 12 Packs Portable Soap Paper Disposable Hand Wash Paper Soap Mini Slice Scents Travel Outdoor Use
Review Date: 2019/03/19
Store: FAMILIFE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'FAMILIFE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '12', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 1.97 x 0.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '799443862763'}
Review Text: I used with water and at best there was only a couple of bubbles. Thought for the price I’d try these. Normally purchasing a more expensive brand I now have found is worth the extra $$ after purchasing and using these. Great smell. Easy to use. Arrived well packaged. I used 5 sheets and each and every single time these didn’t bubble up like others. My hands didn’t feel clean after use. Threw the remaining sheets in the garbage.
Review Title: Hands definitely did NOT feel clean after using these paper soaps. DON’T recommend purchasing.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Skymore 30ml Fast Hair Growth Serum, Anti-Hair Loss, Hair Thinning Treatment, 100% Pure & Natural, Non-Greasy, Nourishing & Moisturizing, All Hair Types
Skymore
{'Brand': 'Skymore', 'Item Form': 'serum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 3.07 Ounces'}
I waited to write review so this product had time to work or not. It arrived 1July. I used that day & have used everyday as of 28July. There are actual tiny strands of hair growing from my scalp where there hasn't been in 4yrs due to medication needed from a horrific accident. Do exactly as instructions indicate. Product arrived well packaged. As a woman lost hair is devastating. To try products with no results will have most women severely depressed. This product made me smile, laugh, cry, and sob all in that order. It was so much to take in when I saw lil sprout's of my hair growing from my scalp, just amazing.. Definitely worth trying. Only 4 stars because I'm not sure how long I'll have to use or if I stop using will my hair stop growing. Other than that reason I would have given 5 star.. Would recommend.
I have tiny strands of hair where there hasnt been any in 4years
Gejoy 12 Pieces Shiny Scrunchie Elastics Scrunchy Bobbles Metallic Hair Scrunchies for Dance Show Party Gym Club of Women and Girls

These arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Loved opening these scrunchies. Vibrant colors.... super stretchy.... super strong.... enjoy wearing these. Just pull up my hair and in the scrunchie and I’m off on my way.
Arrived in a vacuum sealed package!! Vibrant colors. Super stretchy. Very strong.
FAMILIFE Soap Sheets 12 Packs Portable Soap Paper Disposable Hand Wash Paper Soap Mini Slice Scents Travel Outdoor Use
FAMILIFE

I used with water and at best there was only a couple of bubbles. Thought for the price I’d try these. Normally purchasing a more expensive brand I now have found is worth the extra $$ after purchasing and using these. Great smell. Easy to use. Arrived well packaged. I used 5 sheets and each and every single time these didn’t bubble up like others. My hands didn’t feel clean after use. Threw the remaining sheets in the garbage.
Hands definitely did NOT feel clean after using these paper soaps. DON’T recommend purchasing.
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health and Wellness Focus**: The user remains primarily attentive to hair health, particularly interested in products that promote hair growth and address hair loss.
- **Emotional Connection**: Their experiences with hair care products continue to be deeply tied to personal challenges and self-esteem, indicating ongoing importance in this area.
- **Skepticism and Expectations**: The user maintains a cautious approach towards new products, emphasizing the importance of evidence and sustainability in results. Recent experiences with disappointing products underscore this skepticism.
- **Product Experience**: They appreciate detailed packaging and clear instructions, reflecting their preference for brands that provide comprehensive information and support. They previously highlighted positive engagement with vibrant and functional hair accessories.
- **Negative Experience Reflection**: A recent interaction with a new product led to frustration, resulting in a low rating. The user noted dissatisfaction with product performance and expressed a preference for investing in more reliable brands, illustrating their commitment to quality.
- **Positive Reinforcement**: While the user finds satisfaction in functional products, a negative experience has led them to reconsider their choices, indicating that emotional impact and product effectiveness remain essential factors in their evaluations.
- **Moderate Rating Habits**: The user typically rates products 4 stars but has shown a more critical stance, with a recent review reflecting a drastic shift to a 1-star rating based on their experience.

Overall, the user values effective, high-quality products that support their hair care routine while being open to re-evaluating their choices when faced with subpar experiences.
